page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: On the estate nearly every child has a bike.They are mainly B.M.X's.Some children have racers.There are about 3 choppers and about 6 ladies bikes. Some of the children smoke. At night nearly all of us go down to the bus shelter.Katie sometimes comes up to exercise her pony.Sometimes we play tennis,squash,1.2.3 home,rounders, races,rollerbooting,football and rugby.In the summer we sunbathe while we are listening to pop songs. Not all the children live on the estate but they come up because it is boring where they live.We sometimes just sit on the bench and talk. Some of the people go down to the pub and go into the games room to play snooker.There is an air rifle club in the Foley Arms.The children are also allowed to use the school playing field.
